A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie takes place in a bizarro world where nothing you hold dear about Star Wars matters. Things that have made me a fan since childhood were thrown out like a dirty diaper. 

On top of that the story did not seem like a continuation and there was little to no character development. 

I will always me a Star Wars fan but this movie derailed the entire franchise. 

I Hope the story will be salvaged and I can feel like a kid again watching the movies in the future.
